name: Another Simple Space Shooter
description:
This is the first game I've ever made. It took me 4 days, 3 to 8 hours a day. I made it in Godot Engine. I'd like to mention that most of the assets are made by a friend. Some of them I found on the internet - I would give credits, but I have no idea where I got them :-'(

Anyway, ENJOY!
